keymaps.name: Main
keymaps.description: QWERTY is the mother of all layouts. This is the PC version.

keymaps.name: Standby
keymaps.description: QWERTY is the mother of all layouts. This is the PC version.

macroActions.command:
set module.trackpoint.scrollAxisLock 1
set module.trackpoint.caretAxisLock 1
set module.keycluster.scrollAxisLock 1
set module.keycluster.caretAxisLock 1
set module.keycluster.axisLockFirstTickSkew 0.5
